projects.title: OML Alexandria -  In-browser Language Server for OML
projects.bodyText:
- A Cab Sharing web app made using **Django** for **VIT** Students. People can create a new cab or request to join an existing cab.
 - Added User authentication and password reset using **SendGrid**.
 - Deployed on **heroku** using **gunicorn**.

projects.title: Noti.fi
projects.bodyText:
- A simple image-based reminder website with email signup. 
 - Users are sent reminders via push notifications, email and text, as well as repeated weekly/monthly reminders 
 - Worked on the backend stack of the project

projects.title: Reminder Bot
projects.bodyText: - A discord reminder bot that parses a spreadsheet and pings a reminder at the specified time.
